name: Chuck E. Cheese's Party Games
overview: Chuck E. Cheese's Party Gamesis a collection of minigames. Some minigames include Jasper's Derby, Pizza Kitchen, Rhythm Revue, Alley Roller, Smash-A-Munch, Galaxy Hero, and Ready, Aim, Spray, Doing well at these games will earn the player tickets which can be spent at the Prize Shop. The Prize Shop has over 50 items to buy. Purchased prizes can provide the player with more tokens and tickets. The game also lets the player practice the games plus there is also a challenge mode. The challenge mode gives the player a task to perform such as beating a game within a certain time limit.
